org.nashua.tt151.libraries

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nashua.tt151.libraries.Controller
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Controller.DualAction

    public abstract class Controller
extends Object
    This class is a conveniency class for controllers. It allows you to check to see if a button was pressed or released since the last loop. It allows supports a two-state toggle. NOTE: You must call the queryButtons() method on all controller instances at the beginning of each loop. This is to prevent values changing in the middle of a loop.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Brian Ashworth

      static class  Controller.State
      This class holds the possible states for each button
